00042 int lfsck_unpack_ent(struct lu_dirent *ent, __u64 *cookie, __u16 *type)
00043 {
00044         struct luda_type        *lt;
00045         int                      align = sizeof(*lt) - 1;
00046         int                      len;
00047 
00048         fid_le_to_cpu(&ent->lde_fid, &ent->lde_fid);
00049         *cookie = le64_to_cpu(ent->lde_hash);
00050         ent->lde_reclen = le16_to_cpu(ent->lde_reclen);
00051         ent->lde_namelen = le16_to_cpu(ent->lde_namelen);
00052         ent->lde_attrs = le32_to_cpu(ent->lde_attrs);
00053 
00054         if (unlikely(!(ent->lde_attrs & LUDA_TYPE)))
00055                 return -EINVAL;
00056 
00057         len = (ent->lde_namelen + align) & ~align;
00058         lt = (struct luda_type *)(ent->lde_name + len);
00059         *type = le16_to_cpu(lt->lt_type);
00060 
00061         /* Make sure the name is terminated with '\0'. The data (object type)
00062          * after ent::lde_name maybe broken, but we have stored such data in
00063          * the output parameter @type as above. */
00064         ent->lde_name[ent->lde_namelen] = '\0';
00065 
00066         return 0;
00067 }
00068 
00069 static void lfsck_di_oit_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00070 {
00071         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00072         struct dt_it            *di;
00073 
00074         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00075         iops = &lfsck->li_obj_oit->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00076         di = lfsck->li_di_oit;
00077         lfsck->li_di_oit = NULL;
00078         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00079         iops->put(env, di);
00080 }
00081 
00082 static void lfsck_di_dir_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00083 {
00084         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00085         struct dt_it            *di;
00086 
00087         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00088         iops = &lfsck->li_obj_dir->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00089         di = lfsck->li_di_dir;
00090         lfsck->li_di_dir = NULL;
00091         lfsck->li_cookie_dir = 0;
00092         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00093         iops->put(env, di);
00094 }

00096 static int lfsck_parent_fid(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *obj,
00097                             struct lu_fid *fid)
00098 {
00099         if (unlikely(!S_ISDIR(lfsck_object_type(obj)) ||
00100                      !dt_try_as_dir(env, obj)))
00101                 return -ENOTDIR;
00102 
00103         return dt_lookup(env, obj, (struct dt_rec *)fid,
00104                          (const struct dt_key *)"..");
00105 }
00106 
00132 static int lfsck_needs_scan_dir(const struct lu_env *env,
00133                                 struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00134                                 struct dt_object *obj)
00135 {
00136         struct lfsck_thread_info *info    = lfsck_env_info(env);
00137         struct lu_fid            *fid     = &info->lti_fid;
00138         struct lu_seq_range      *range   = &info->lti_range;
00139         struct seq_server_site   *ss      = lfsck_dev_site(lfsck);
00140         __u32                     idx     = lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck);
00141         int                       depth   = 0;
00142         int                       rc      = 0;
00143 
00144         if (list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_dir) || !S_ISDIR(lfsck_object_type(obj)))
00145                 return 0;
00146 
00147         LASSERT(ss != NULL);
00148 
00149         *fid = *lfsck_dto2fid(obj);
00150         while (1) {
00151                 /* Global /ROOT is visible. */
00152                 if (unlikely(lu_fid_eq(fid, &lfsck->li_global_root_fid)))
00153                         return 1;
00154 
00155                 /* Backend root is invisible. */
00156                 if (unlikely(lu_fid_eq(fid, &lfsck->li_local_root_fid)))
00157                         return 0;
00158 
00159                 if (!fid_is_norm(fid) && !fid_is_igif(fid))
00160                         return 0;
00161 
00162                 fld_range_set_mdt(range);
00163                 rc = fld_local_lookup(env, ss->ss_server_fld,
00164                                       fid_seq(fid), range);
00165                 if (rc != 0 || range->lsr_index != idx)
00166                         /* Current FID should NOT be for the input parameter
00167                          * @obj, because the lfsck_master_oit_engine() has
00168                          * filtered out agent object. So current FID is for
00169                          * the ancestor of the original input parameter @obj.
00170                          * So the ancestor is a remote directory. The input
00171                          * parameter @obj is local directory, and should be
00172                          * scanned under such case. */
00173                         return 1;
00174 
00175                 /* normal FID on this target (locally) must be for the
00176                  * client-side visiable object. */
00177                 if (fid_is_norm(fid))
00178                         return 1;
00179 
00180                 if (obj == NULL) {
00181                         obj = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, fid);
00182                         if (IS_ERR(obj))
00183                                 return PTR_ERR(obj);
00184 
00185                         depth++;
00186                         if (!dt_object_exists(obj))
00187                                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00188                 }
00189 
00190                 dt_read_lock(env, obj, MOR_TGT_CHILD);
00191                 if (unlikely(lfsck_is_dead_obj(obj))) {
00192                         dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
00193 
00194                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00195                 }
00196 
00197                 rc = dt_xattr_get(env, obj,
00198                                   lfsck_buf_get(env, NULL, 0), XATTR_NAME_LINK);
00199                 dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
00200                 if (rc >= 0)
00201                         GOTO(out, rc = 1);
00202 
00203                 if (rc < 0 && rc != -ENODATA)
00204                         GOTO(out, rc);
00205 
00206                 rc = lfsck_parent_fid(env, obj, fid);
00207                 if (depth > 0)
00208                         lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
00209 
00210                 obj = NULL;
00211                 if (rc != 0)
00212                         return rc;
00213 
00214                 if (!fid_is_sane(fid))
00215                         return 0;
00216         }
00217 
00218 out:
00219         if (depth > 0 && obj != NULL)
00220                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
00221 
00222         return rc;
00223 }
00224 
00225 static int lfsck_load_stripe_lmv(const struct lu_env *env,
00226                                  struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00227                                  struct dt_object *obj)
00228 {
00229         struct lmv_mds_md_v1    *lmv    = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_lmv;
00230         struct lfsck_lmv        *llmv;
00231         int                      rc;
00232         ENTRY;
00233 
00234         LASSERT(lfsck->li_obj_dir == NULL);
00235         LASSERT(lfsck->li_lmv == NULL);
00236 
00237         rc = lfsck_read_stripe_lmv(env, obj, lmv);
00238         if (rc == -ENODATA) {
00239                 lfsck->li_obj_dir = lfsck_object_get(obj);
00240 
00241                 RETURN(0);
00242         }
00243 
00244         if (rc < 0)
00245                 RETURN(rc);
00246 
00247         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(llmv);
00248         if (llmv == NULL)
00249                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00250 
00251         if (lmv->lmv_magic == LMV_MAGIC) {
00252                 struct lfsck_slave_lmv_rec      *lslr;
00253                 __u32                            stripes;
00254 
00255                 llmv->ll_lmv_master = 1;
00256                 if (lmv->lmv_stripe_count < 1)
00257                         stripes = LFSCK_LMV_DEF_STRIPES;
00258                 else if (lmv->lmv_stripe_count > LFSCK_LMV_MAX_STRIPES)
00259                         stripes = LFSCK_LMV_MAX_STRIPES;
00260                 else
00261                         stripes = lmv->lmv_stripe_count;
00262 
00263                 OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(lslr, sizeof(*lslr) * stripes);
00264                 if (lslr == NULL) {
00265                         OBD_FREE_PTR(llmv);
00266 
00267                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00268                 }
00269 
00270                 llmv->ll_stripes_allocated = stripes;
00271                 llmv->ll_hash_type = LMV_HASH_TYPE_UNKNOWN;
00272                 llmv->ll_lslr = lslr;
00273         } else {
00274                 llmv->ll_lmv_slave = 1;
00275         }
00276 
00277         lfsck->li_obj_dir = lfsck_object_get(obj);
00278         llmv->ll_lmv = *lmv;
00279         atomic_set(&llmv->ll_ref, 1);
00280         lfsck->li_lmv = llmv;
00281 
00282         RETURN(0);
00283 }

00287 static void lfsck_fail(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00288                        bool new_checked)
00289 {
00290         struct lfsck_component *com;
00291 
00292         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
00293                 com->lc_ops->lfsck_fail(env, com, new_checked);
00294         }
00295 }
00296 
00297 void lfsck_close_dir(const struct lu_env *env,
00298                      struct lfsck_instance *lfsck, int result)
00299 {
00300         struct lfsck_component *com;
00301         ENTRY;
00302 
00303         if (lfsck->li_lmv != NULL) {
00304                 lfsck->li_lmv->ll_exit_value = result;
00305                 if (lfsck->li_obj_dir != NULL) {
00306                         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_dir,
00307                                             lc_link_dir) {
00308                                 com->lc_ops->lfsck_close_dir(env, com);
00309                         }
00310                 }
00311 
00312                 lfsck_lmv_put(env, lfsck->li_lmv);
00313                 lfsck->li_lmv = NULL;
00314         }
00315 
00316         if (lfsck->li_di_dir != NULL) {
00317                 const struct dt_it_ops  *dir_iops;
00318                 struct dt_it            *dir_di   = lfsck->li_di_dir;
00319 
00320                 LASSERT(lfsck->li_obj_dir != NULL);
00321 
00322                 dir_iops = &lfsck->li_obj_dir->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00323                 lfsck_di_dir_put(env, lfsck);
00324                 dir_iops->fini(env, dir_di);
00325         }
00326 
00327         if (lfsck->li_obj_dir != NULL) {
00328                 struct dt_object        *dir_obj  = lfsck->li_obj_dir;
00329 
00330                 lfsck->li_obj_dir = NULL;
00331                 lfsck_object_put(env, dir_obj);
00332         }
00333 
00334         EXIT;
00335 }
00336 
00337 int lfsck_open_dir(const struct lu_env *env,
00338                    struct lfsck_instance *lfsck, __u64 cookie)
00339 {
00340         struct dt_object        *obj    = lfsck->li_obj_dir;
00341         struct dt_it            *di     = lfsck->li_di_dir;
00342         struct lfsck_component  *com;
00343         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00344         int                      rc     = 0;
00345         ENTRY;
00346 
00347         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
00348         LASSERT(di == NULL);
00349 
00350         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, obj)))
00351                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTDIR);
00352 
00353         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_dir, lc_link_dir) {
00354                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_open_dir(env, com);
00355                 if (rc != 0)
00356                         GOTO(out, rc);
00357         }
00358 
00359         iops = &obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00360         di = iops->init(env, obj, lfsck->li_args_dir);
00361         if (IS_ERR(di))
00362                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(di));
00363 
00364         rc = iops->load(env, di, cookie);
00365         if (rc == 0 || (rc > 0 && cookie > 0))
00366                 rc = iops->next(env, di);
00367         else if (rc > 0)
00368                 rc = 0;
00369 
00370         if (rc != 0) {
00371                 iops->put(env, di);
00372                 iops->fini(env, di);
00373         } else {
00374                 lfsck->li_cookie_dir = iops->store(env, di);
00375                 spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00376                 lfsck->li_di_dir = di;
00377                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00378         }
00379 
00380         GOTO(out, rc);
00381 
00382 out:
00383         if (rc != 0)
00384                 lfsck_close_dir(env, lfsck, rc);
00385 
00386         return rc;
00387 }
00388 
00389 static int lfsck_checkpoint(const struct lu_env *env,
00390                             struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00391 {
00392         struct lfsck_component *com;
00393         int                     rc  = 0;
00394         int                     rc1 = 0;
00395 
00396         if (likely(cfs_time_beforeq(cfs_time_current(),
00397                                     lfsck->li_time_next_checkpoint)))
00398                 return 0;
00399 
00400         lfsck_pos_fill(env, lfsck, &lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint, false);
00401         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
00402                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_checkpoint(env, com, false);
00403                 if (rc != 0)
00404                         rc1 = rc;
00405         }
00406 
00407         lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current();
00408         lfsck->li_time_next_checkpoint = lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint +
00409                                 cfs_time_seconds(LFSCK_CHECKPOINT_INTERVAL);
00410         return rc1 != 0 ? rc1 : rc;
00411 }
00412 
00413 static int lfsck_prep(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00414                       struct lfsck_start_param *lsp)
00415 {
00416         struct dt_object       *obj     = NULL;
00417         struct lfsck_component *com;
00418         struct lfsck_component *next;
00419         struct lfsck_position  *pos     = NULL;
00420         const struct dt_it_ops *iops    =
00421                                 &lfsck->li_obj_oit->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00422         int                     rc;
00423         ENTRY;
00424 
00425         LASSERT(lfsck->li_obj_dir == NULL);
00426         LASSERT(lfsck->li_di_dir == NULL);
00427 
00428         lfsck->li_current_oit_processed = 0;
00429         list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
00430                 com->lc_new_checked = 0;
00431                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_prep(env, com, lsp);
00432                 if (rc != 0)
00433                         GOTO(out, rc);
00434 
00435                 if ((pos == NULL) ||
00436                     (!lfsck_pos_is_zero(&com->lc_pos_start) &&
00437                      lfsck_pos_is_eq(pos, &com->lc_pos_start) > 0))
00438                         pos = &com->lc_pos_start;
00439         }
00440 
00441         /* Init otable-based iterator. */
00442         if (pos == NULL) {
00443                 rc = iops->load(env, lfsck->li_di_oit, 0);
00444                 if (rc > 0) {
00445                         lfsck->li_oit_over = 1;
00446                         rc = 0;
00447                 }
00448 
00449                 GOTO(out, rc);
00450         }
00451 
00452         rc = iops->load(env, lfsck->li_di_oit, pos->lp_oit_cookie);
00453         if (rc < 0)
00454                 GOTO(out, rc);
00455         else if (rc > 0)
00456                 lfsck->li_oit_over = 1;
00457 
00458         if (!lfsck->li_master || fid_is_zero(&pos->lp_dir_parent))
00459                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00460 
00461         /* Find the directory for namespace-based traverse. */
00462         obj = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, &pos->lp_dir_parent);
00463         if (IS_ERR(obj))
00464                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(obj));
00465 
00466         /* Remote directory will be scanned by the LFSCK instance
00467          * on the MDT where the remote object really resides on. */
00468         if (!dt_object_exists(obj) || dt_object_remote(obj) ||
00469             unlikely(!S_ISDIR(lfsck_object_type(obj))))
00470                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00471 
00472         rc = lfsck_load_stripe_lmv(env, lfsck, obj);
00473         if (rc == 0) {
00474                 /* For the master MDT-object of a striped directory,
00475                  * reset the iteration from the directory beginning. */
00476                 if (lfsck->li_lmv != NULL && lfsck->li_lmv->ll_lmv_master)
00477                         pos->lp_dir_cookie = 0;
00478 
00479                 rc = lfsck_open_dir(env, lfsck, pos->lp_dir_cookie);
00480                 if (rc > 0)
00481                         /* The end of the directory. */
00482                         rc = 0;
00483         }
00484 
00485         GOTO(out, rc);
00486 
00487 out:
00488         if (obj != NULL)
00489                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
00490 
00491         if (rc != 0) {
00492                 lfsck_close_dir(env, lfsck, rc);
00493                 list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_scan,
00494                                          lc_link) {
00495                         com->lc_ops->lfsck_post(env, com, rc, true);
00496                 }
00497 
00498                 return rc;
00499         }
00500 
00501         rc = 0;
00502         lfsck_pos_fill(env, lfsck, &lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint, true);
00503         lfsck->li_pos_current = lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint;
00504         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
00505                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_checkpoint(env, com, true);
00506                 if (rc != 0)
00507                         break;
00508         }
00509 
00510         lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current();
00511         lfsck->li_time_next_checkpoint = lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint +
00512                                 cfs_time_seconds(LFSCK_CHECKPOINT_INTERVAL);
00513         return rc;
00514 }
00515 
00516 static int lfsck_exec_oit(const struct lu_env *env,
00517                           struct lfsck_instance *lfsck, struct dt_object *obj)
00518 {
00519         struct lfsck_component *com;
00520         int                     rc;
00521         ENTRY;
00522 
00523         LASSERT(lfsck->li_obj_dir == NULL);
00524 
00525         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
00526                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_exec_oit(env, com, obj);
00527                 if (rc != 0)
00528                         RETURN(rc);
00529         }
00530 
00531         rc = lfsck_needs_scan_dir(env, lfsck, obj);
00532         if (rc <= 0)
00533                 GOTO(out, rc);
00534 
00535         rc = lfsck_load_stripe_lmv(env, lfsck, obj);
00536         if (rc == 0)
00537                 rc = lfsck_open_dir(env, lfsck, 0);
00538 
00539         GOTO(out, rc);
00540 
00541 out:
00542         if (rc < 0)
00543                 lfsck_fail(env, lfsck, false);
00544 
00545         if (rc != 0)
00546                 lfsck_close_dir(env, lfsck, rc);
00547 
00548         return rc > 0 ? 0 : rc;
00549 }
00550 
00551 static int lfsck_exec_dir(const struct lu_env *env,
00552                           struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00553                           struct lfsck_assistant_object *lso,
00554                           struct lu_dirent *ent, __u16 type)
00555 {
00556         struct lfsck_component *com;
00557         int                     rc;
00558 
00559         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
00560                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_exec_dir(env, com, lso, ent, type);
00561                 if (rc != 0)
00562                         return rc;
00563         }
00564         return 0;
00565 }
00566 
00567 static int lfsck_master_dir_engine(const struct lu_env *env,
00568                                    struct lfsck_instance *lfsck);
00569 
00570 static int lfsck_post(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00571                       int result)
00572 {
00573         struct lfsck_component *com;
00574         struct lfsck_component *next;
00575         int                     rc  = result;
00576 
00577         lfsck_pos_fill(env, lfsck, &lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint, false);
00578         lfsck_close_dir(env, lfsck, result);
00579 
00580         while (thread_is_running(&lfsck->li_thread) && rc > 0 &&
00581                !list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_lmv)) {
00582                 struct lfsck_lmv_unit *llu;
00583 
00584                 spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00585                 llu = list_entry(lfsck->li_list_lmv.next,
00586                                  struct lfsck_lmv_unit, llu_link);
00587                 list_del_init(&llu->llu_link);
00588                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00589 
00590                 lfsck->li_lmv = &llu->llu_lmv;
00591                 lfsck->li_obj_dir = lfsck_object_get(llu->llu_obj);
00592                 rc = lfsck_open_dir(env, lfsck, 0);
00593                 if (rc == 0) {
00594                         rc = lfsck_master_dir_engine(env, lfsck);
00595                         lfsck_close_dir(env, lfsck, result);
00596                 }
00597         }
00598 
00599         result = rc;
00600 
00601         list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
00602                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_post(env, com, result, false);
00603                 if (rc != 0)
00604                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: lfsck_post at the component %u: "
00605                                "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
00606                                (__u32)com->lc_type, rc);
00607         }
00608 
00609         lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current();
00610         lfsck->li_time_next_checkpoint = lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint +
00611                                 cfs_time_seconds(LFSCK_CHECKPOINT_INTERVAL);
00612 
00613         /* Ignore some component post failure to make other can go ahead. */
00614         return result;
00615 }
00616 
00617 static int lfsck_double_scan(const struct lu_env *env,
00618                              struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00619 {
00620         struct lfsck_component *com;
00621         struct lfsck_component *next;
00622         struct l_wait_info      lwi = { 0 };
00623         int                     rc  = 0;
00624         int                     rc1 = 0;
00625 
00626         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_double_scan, lc_link) {
00627                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_double_scan(env, com);
00628                 if (rc != 0)
00629                         rc1 = rc;
00630         }
00631 
00632         l_wait_event(lfsck->li_thread.t_ctl_waitq,
00633                      atomic_read(&lfsck->li_double_scan_count) == 0,
00634                      &lwi);
00635 
00636         if (lfsck->li_status != LS_PAUSED &&
00637             lfsck->li_status != LS_CO_PAUSED) {
00638                 list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_double_scan,
00639                                          lc_link) {
00640                         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00641                         list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
00642                         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00643                 }
00644         }
00645 
00646         return rc1 != 0 ? rc1 : rc;
00647 }
00648 
00649 static void lfsck_quit(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00650 {
00651         struct lfsck_component *com;
00652         struct lfsck_component *next;
00653 
00654         list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_scan,
00655                                  lc_link) {
00656                 if (com->lc_ops->lfsck_quit != NULL)
00657                         com->lc_ops->lfsck_quit(env, com);
00658 
00659                 spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00660                 list_del_init(&com->lc_link_dir);
00661                 list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
00662                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00663         }
00664 
00665         list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_double_scan,
00666                                  lc_link) {
00667                 if (com->lc_ops->lfsck_quit != NULL)
00668                         com->lc_ops->lfsck_quit(env, com);
00669 
00670                 spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00671                 list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
00672                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00673         }
00674 }
00675 
00676 /* LFSCK engines */
00677 
00678 static int lfsck_master_dir_engine(const struct lu_env *env,
00679                                    struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00680 {
00681         struct lfsck_thread_info        *info   = lfsck_env_info(env);
00682         struct dt_object                *dir    = lfsck->li_obj_dir;
00683         const struct dt_it_ops          *iops   = &dir->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00684         struct dt_it                    *di     = lfsck->li_di_dir;
00685         struct lu_dirent                *ent    =
00686                         (struct lu_dirent *)info->lti_key;
00687         struct lfsck_bookmark           *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00688         struct ptlrpc_thread            *thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
00689         struct lfsck_assistant_object   *lso    = NULL;
00690         int                              rc;
00691         __u16                            type;
00692         ENTRY;
00693 
00694         do {
00695                 if (CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_DELAY2, cfs_fail_val) &&
00696                     unlikely(!thread_is_running(thread))) {
00697                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: scan dir exit for engine stop, "
00698                                "parent "DFID", cookie "LPX64"\n",
00699                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
00700                                PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(dir)), lfsck->li_cookie_dir);
00701 
00702                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00703                 }
00704 
00705                 lfsck->li_new_scanned++;
00706                 rc = iops->rec(env, di, (struct dt_rec *)ent,
00707                                lfsck->li_args_dir);
00708                 if (rc == 0)
00709                         rc = lfsck_unpack_ent(ent, &lfsck->li_cookie_dir,
00710                                               &type);
00711 
00712                 if (rc != 0) {
00713                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: scan dir failed at rec(), "
00714                                "parent "DFID", cookie "LPX64": rc = %d\n",
00715                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
00716                                PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(dir)),
00717                                lfsck->li_cookie_dir, rc);
00718                         lfsck_fail(env, lfsck, true);
00719                         if (bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
00720                                 GOTO(out, rc);
00721                         else
00722                                 goto checkpoint;
00723                 }
00724 
00725                 if (ent->lde_attrs & LUDA_IGNORE)
00726                         goto checkpoint;
00727 
00728                 /* skip dot entry. */
00729                 if (ent->lde_namelen == 1 && ent->lde_name[0] == '.')
00730                         goto checkpoint;
00731 
00732                 if (lso == NULL) {
00733                         lso = lfsck_assistant_object_init(env,
00734                                 lfsck_dto2fid(dir), NULL,
00735                                 lfsck->li_pos_current.lp_oit_cookie, true);
00736                         if (IS_ERR(lso)) {
00737                                 if (bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
00738                                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(lso));
00739 
00740                                 lso = NULL;
00741                                 goto checkpoint;
00742                         }
00743                 }
00744 
00745                 /* The type in the @ent structure may has been overwritten,
00746                  * so we need to pass the @type parameter independently. */
00747                 rc = lfsck_exec_dir(env, lfsck, lso, ent, type);
00748                 if (rc != 0 && bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
00749                         GOTO(out, rc);
00750 
00751 checkpoint:
00752                 rc = lfsck_checkpoint(env, lfsck);
00753                 if (rc != 0 && bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
00754                         GOTO(out, rc);
00755 
00756                 /* Rate control. */
00757                 lfsck_control_speed(lfsck);
00758                 if (unlikely(!thread_is_running(thread))) {
00759                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: scan dir exit for engine stop, "
00760                                "parent "DFID", cookie "LPX64"\n",
00761                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
00762                                PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(dir)),
00763                                lfsck->li_cookie_dir);
00764                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00765                 }
00766 
00767                 if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_FATAL2)) {
00768                         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00769                         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPING);
00770                         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00771                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00772                 }
00773 
00774                 rc = iops->next(env, di);
00775         } while (rc == 0);
00776 
00777         if (rc > 0 && !lfsck->li_oit_over)
00778                 lfsck_close_dir(env, lfsck, rc);
00779 
00780         GOTO(out, rc);
00781 
00782 out:
00783         if (lso != NULL)
00784                 lfsck_assistant_object_put(env, lso);
00785 
00786         return rc;
00787 }
00788 
00811 static int lfsck_master_oit_engine(const struct lu_env *env,
00812                                    struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00813 {
00814         struct lfsck_thread_info *info  = lfsck_env_info(env);
00815         const struct dt_it_ops   *iops  =
00816                                 &lfsck->li_obj_oit->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00817         struct dt_it             *di    = lfsck->li_di_oit;
00818         struct lu_fid            *fid   = &info->lti_fid;
00819         struct lfsck_bookmark    *bk    = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00820         struct ptlrpc_thread     *thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
00821         struct seq_server_site   *ss    = lfsck_dev_site(lfsck);
00822         __u32                    idx    = lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck);
00823         int                      rc;
00824         ENTRY;
00825 
00826         if (unlikely(ss == NULL))
00827                 RETURN(-EIO);
00828 
00829         do {
00830                 struct dt_object *target;
00831 
00832                 if (lfsck->li_di_dir != NULL) {
00833                         rc = lfsck_master_dir_engine(env, lfsck);
00834                         if (rc <= 0)
00835                                 RETURN(rc);
00836                 }
00837 
00838                 if (unlikely(lfsck->li_oit_over))
00839                         RETURN(1);
00840 
00841                 if (CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_DELAY1, cfs_fail_val) &&
00842                     unlikely(!thread_is_running(thread))) {
00843                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: OIT scan exit for engine stop, "
00844                                "cookie "LPU64"\n",
00845                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), iops->store(env, di));
00846 
00847                         RETURN(0);
00848                 }
00849 
00850                 if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_CRASH))
00851                         RETURN(0);
00852 
00853                 lfsck->li_current_oit_processed = 1;
00854 
00855                 if (!list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_lmv)) {
00856                         struct lfsck_lmv_unit *llu;
00857 
00858                         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00859                         llu = list_entry(lfsck->li_list_lmv.next,
00860                                          struct lfsck_lmv_unit, llu_link);
00861                         list_del_init(&llu->llu_link);
00862                         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00863 
00864                         lfsck->li_lmv = &llu->llu_lmv;
00865                         lfsck->li_obj_dir = lfsck_object_get(llu->llu_obj);
00866                         rc = lfsck_open_dir(env, lfsck, 0);
00867                         if (rc == 0)
00868                                 rc = lfsck_master_dir_engine(env, lfsck);
00869 
00870                         if (rc <= 0)
00871                                 RETURN(rc);
00872                 }
00873 
00874                 lfsck->li_new_scanned++;
00875                 lfsck->li_pos_current.lp_oit_cookie = iops->store(env, di);
00876                 rc = iops->rec(env, di, (struct dt_rec *)fid, 0);
00877                 if (rc != 0) {
00878                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: OIT scan failed at rec(): "
00879                                "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
00880                         lfsck_fail(env, lfsck, true);
00881                         if (rc < 0 && bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
00882                                 RETURN(rc);
00883                         else
00884                                 goto checkpoint;
00885                 }
00886 
00887                 if (unlikely(!fid_is_sane(fid))) {
00888                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: OIT scan find invalid FID "DFID
00889                                ", skip it\n",
00890                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), PFID(fid));
00891                         goto checkpoint;
00892                 }
00893 
00894                 if (fid_is_idif(fid)) {
00895                         __u32 idx1 = fid_idif_ost_idx(fid);
00896 
00897                         LASSERT(!lfsck->li_master);
00898 
00899                         if (idx != idx1) {
00900                                 struct ost_id *oi = &info->lti_oi;
00901 
00902                                 if (unlikely(idx1 != 0)) {
00903                                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: invalid IDIF "DFID
00904                                                ", not match device index %u\n",
00905                                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
00906                                                PFID(fid), idx);
00907 
00908                                         goto checkpoint;
00909                                 }
00910 
00911                                 /* rebuild the IDIF with index to
00912                                  * avoid double instances for the
00913                                  * same object. */
00914                                 fid_to_ostid(fid, oi);
00915                                 ostid_to_fid(fid, oi, idx);
00916                         }
00917                 } else if (!fid_is_norm(fid) && !fid_is_igif(fid) &&
00918                            !fid_is_last_id(fid) &&
00919                            !lu_fid_eq(fid, &lfsck->li_global_root_fid)) {
00920 
00921                         /* If the FID/object is only used locally and invisible
00922                          * to external nodes, then LFSCK will not handle it.
00923                          *
00924                          * dot_lustre sequence has been handled specially. */
00925                         goto checkpoint;
00926                 } else {
00927                         struct lu_seq_range *range = &info->lti_range;
00928 
00929                         if (lfsck->li_master)
00930                                 fld_range_set_mdt(range);
00931                         else
00932                                 fld_range_set_ost(range);
00933                         rc = fld_local_lookup(env, ss->ss_server_fld,
00934                                               fid_seq(fid), range);
00935                         if (rc != 0 || range->lsr_index != idx) {
00936                                 /* Remote object will be handled by the LFSCK
00937                                  * instance on the MDT where the remote object
00938                                  * really resides on. */
00939                                 rc = 0;
00940                                 goto checkpoint;
00941                         }
00942                 }
00943 
00944                 target = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, fid);
00945                 if (IS_ERR(target)) {
00946                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: OIT scan failed at find target "
00947                                DFID", cookie "LPU64": rc = %d\n",
00948                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), PFID(fid),
00949                                iops->store(env, di), rc);
00950                         lfsck_fail(env, lfsck, true);
00951                         if (bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
00952                                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(target));
00953                         else
00954                                 goto checkpoint;
00955                 }
00956 
00957                 if (dt_object_exists(target))
00958                         rc = lfsck_exec_oit(env, lfsck, target);
00959 
00960                 lfsck_object_put(env, target);
00961                 if (rc != 0 && bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
00962                         RETURN(rc);
00963 
00964 checkpoint:
00965                 rc = lfsck_checkpoint(env, lfsck);
00966                 if (rc != 0 && bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
00967                         RETURN(rc);
00968 
00969                 /* Rate control. */
00970                 lfsck_control_speed(lfsck);
00971 
00972                 if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_FATAL1)) {
00973                         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00974                         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPING);
00975                         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00976                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00977                 }
00978 
00979                 rc = iops->next(env, di);
00980                 if (unlikely(rc > 0))
00981                         lfsck->li_oit_over = 1;
00982                 else if (likely(rc == 0))
00983                         lfsck->li_current_oit_processed = 0;
00984 
00985                 if (unlikely(!thread_is_running(thread))) {
00986                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: OIT scan exit for engine stop, "
00987                                "cookie "LPU64"\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
00988                                iops->store(env, di));
00989                         RETURN(0);
00990                 }
00991         } while (rc == 0 || lfsck->li_di_dir != NULL);
00992 
00993         RETURN(rc);
00994 }
00995 
00996 int lfsck_master_engine(void *args)
00997 {
00998         struct lfsck_thread_args *lta      = args;
00999         struct lu_env            *env      = &lta->lta_env;
01000         struct lfsck_instance    *lfsck    = lta->lta_lfsck;
01001         struct ptlrpc_thread     *thread   = &lfsck->li_thread;
01002         struct dt_object         *oit_obj  = lfsck->li_obj_oit;
01003         const struct dt_it_ops   *oit_iops = &oit_obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
01004         struct dt_it             *oit_di;
01005         struct l_wait_info        lwi      = { 0 };
01006         int                       rc;
01007         ENTRY;
01008 
01009         /* There will be some objects verification during the LFSCK start,
01010          * such as the subsequent lfsck_verify_lpf(). Trigger low layer OI
01011          * OI scrub before that to handle the potential inconsistence. */
01012         oit_di = oit_iops->init(env, oit_obj, lfsck->li_args_oit);
01013         if (IS_ERR(oit_di)) {
01014                 rc = PTR_ERR(oit_di);
01015                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: master engine fail to init iteration: "
01016                        "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
01017 
01018                 GOTO(fini_args, rc);
01019         }
01020 
01021         if (lfsck->li_master &&
01022             (!list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_scan) ||
01023              !list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_double_scan))) {
01024                 rc = lfsck_verify_lpf(env, lfsck);
01025                 /* Fail to verify the .lustre/lost+found/MDTxxxx/ may be not
01026                  * fatal, because the .lustre/lost+found/ maybe not accessed
01027                  * by the LFSCK if it does not add orphans or others to such
01028                  * directory. So go ahead until hit failure when really uses
01029                  * the directory. */
01030                 if (rc != 0)
01031                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: master engine fail to verify the "
01032                                ".lustre/lost+found/, go ahead: rc = %d\n",
01033                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
01034         }
01035 
01036         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
01037         lfsck->li_di_oit = oit_di;
01038         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
01039         rc = lfsck_prep(env, lfsck, lta->lta_lsp);
01040         if (rc != 0)
01041                 GOTO(fini_oit, rc);
01042 
01043         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "LFSCK entry: oit_flags = %#x, dir_flags = %#x, "
01044                "oit_cookie = "LPU64", dir_cookie = "LPX64", parent = "DFID
01045                ", pid = %d\n", lfsck->li_args_oit, lfsck->li_args_dir,
01046                lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_oit_cookie,
01047                lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_dir_cookie,
01048                PFID(&lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_dir_parent),
01049                current_pid());
01050 
01051         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
01052         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_RUNNING);
01053         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
01054         wake_up_all(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
01055 
01056         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
01057                      lfsck->li_start_unplug ||
01058                      !thread_is_running(thread),
01059                      &lwi);
01060         if (!thread_is_running(thread))
01061                 GOTO(fini_oit, rc = 0);
01062 
01063         if (!list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_scan) ||
01064             list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_double_scan))
01065                 rc = lfsck_master_oit_engine(env, lfsck);
01066         else
01067                 rc = 1;
01068 
01069         lfsck_pos_fill(env, lfsck, &lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint, false);
01070         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "LFSCK exit: oit_flags = %#x, dir_flags = %#x, "
01071                "oit_cookie = "LPU64", dir_cookie = "LPX64", parent = "DFID
01072                ", pid = %d, rc = %d\n", lfsck->li_args_oit, lfsck->li_args_dir,
01073                lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_oit_cookie,
01074                lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_dir_cookie,
01075                PFID(&lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_dir_parent),
01076                current_pid(), rc);
01077 
01078         if (!OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_CRASH))
01079                 rc = lfsck_post(env, lfsck, rc);
01080         else
01081                 lfsck_close_dir(env, lfsck, rc);
01082 
01083 fini_oit:
01084         lfsck_di_oit_put(env, lfsck);
01085         oit_iops->fini(env, oit_di);
01086         if (rc == 1) {
01087                 if (!list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_double_scan))
01088                         rc = lfsck_double_scan(env, lfsck);
01089                 else
01090                         rc = 0;
01091         } else {
01092                 lfsck_quit(env, lfsck);
01093         }
01094 
01095         /* XXX: Purge the pinned objects in the future. */
01096 
01097 fini_args:
01098         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
01099         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPED);
01100         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
01101         wake_up_all(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
01102         lfsck_thread_args_fini(lta);
01103         return rc;
01104 }
01105 
01106 static inline bool lfsck_assistant_req_empty(struct lfsck_assistant_data *lad)
01107 {
01108         bool empty = false;
01109 
01110         spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
01111         if (list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list))
01112                 empty = true;
01113         spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
01114 
01115         return empty;
01116 }
01117 
01131 static int lfsck_assistant_query_others(const struct lu_env *env,
01132                                         struct lfsck_component *com)
01133 {
01134         struct lfsck_thread_info          *info  = lfsck_env_info(env);
01135         struct lfsck_request              *lr    = &info->lti_lr;
01136         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia  = &info->lti_laia;
01137         struct lfsck_instance             *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
01138         struct lfsck_assistant_data       *lad   = com->lc_data;
01139         struct ptlrpc_request_set         *set;
01140         struct lfsck_tgt_descs            *ltds;
01141         struct lfsck_tgt_desc             *ltd;
01142         struct list_head                  *phase_head;
01143         int                                rc    = 0;
01144         int                                rc1   = 0;
01145         ENTRY;
01146 
01147         set = ptlrpc_prep_set();
01148         if (set == NULL)
01149                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01150 
01151         lad->lad_touch_gen++;
01152         memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
01153         lr->lr_event = LE_QUERY;
01154         lr->lr_active = com->lc_type;
01155 
01156         memset(laia, 0, sizeof(*laia));
01157         laia->laia_com = com;
01158         laia->laia_lr = lr;
01159 
01160         if (!list_empty(&lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list)) {
01161                 ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
01162                 lr->lr_flags = 0;
01163                 phase_head = &lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list;
01164         } else if (com->lc_type != LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
01165                 goto out;
01166         } else {
01167 
01168 again:
01169                 ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
01170                 lr->lr_flags = LEF_TO_OST;
01171                 phase_head = &lad->lad_ost_phase1_list;
01172         }
01173 
01174         laia->laia_ltds = ltds;
01175         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01176         while (!list_empty(phase_head)) {
01177                 struct list_head *phase_list;
01178                 __u32            *gen;
01179 
01180                 if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
01181                         ltd = list_entry(phase_head->next,
01182                                          struct lfsck_tgt_desc,
01183                                          ltd_layout_phase_list);
01184                         phase_list = &ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list;
01185                         gen = &ltd->ltd_layout_gen;
01186                 } else {
01187                         ltd = list_entry(phase_head->next,
01188                                          struct lfsck_tgt_desc,
01189                                          ltd_namespace_phase_list);
01190                         phase_list = &ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list;
01191                         gen = &ltd->ltd_namespace_gen;
01192                 }
01193 
01194                 if (*gen == lad->lad_touch_gen)
01195                         break;
01196 
01197                 *gen = lad->lad_touch_gen;
01198                 list_move_tail(phase_list, phase_head);
01199                 atomic_inc(&ltd->ltd_ref);
01200                 laia->laia_ltd = ltd;
01201                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01202                 rc = lfsck_async_request(env, ltd->ltd_exp, lr, set,
01203                                          lfsck_async_interpret_common,
01204                                          laia, LFSCK_QUERY);
01205                 if (rc != 0) {
01206                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant fail to query "
01207                                "%s %x for %s: rc = %d\n",
01208                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
01209                                (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST) ? "OST" : "MDT",
01210                                ltd->ltd_index, lad->lad_name, rc);
01211                         lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
01212                         rc1 = rc;
01213                 }
01214                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01215         }
01216         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01217 
01218         rc = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
01219         if (rc < 0) {
01220                 ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
01221                 RETURN(rc);
01222         }
01223 
01224         if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT && !(lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST) &&
01225             list_empty(&lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list))
01226                 goto again;
01227 
01228 out:
01229         ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
01230 
01231         RETURN(rc1 != 0 ? rc1 : rc);
01232 }
01233 
01248 static int lfsck_assistant_notify_others(const struct lu_env *env,
01249                                          struct lfsck_component *com,
01250                                          struct lfsck_request *lr)
01251 {
01252         struct lfsck_thread_info          *info  = lfsck_env_info(env);
01253         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia  = &info->lti_laia;
01254         struct lfsck_instance             *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
01255         struct lfsck_assistant_data       *lad   = com->lc_data;
01256         struct lfsck_bookmark             *bk    = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
01257         struct ptlrpc_request_set         *set;
01258         struct lfsck_tgt_descs            *ltds;
01259         struct lfsck_tgt_desc             *ltd;
01260         struct lfsck_tgt_desc             *next;
01261         __u32                              idx;
01262         int                                rc    = 0;
01263         int                                rc1   = 0;
01264         ENTRY;
01265 
01266         set = ptlrpc_prep_set();
01267         if (set == NULL)
01268                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01269 
01270         lr->lr_index = lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck);
01271         lr->lr_active = com->lc_type;
01272 
01273         memset(laia, 0, sizeof(*laia));
01274         laia->laia_com = com;
01275         laia->laia_lr = lr;
01276 
01277         switch (lr->lr_event) {
01278         case LE_START:
01279                 if (com->lc_type != LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT)
01280                         goto next;
01281 
01282                 lr->lr_valid = LSV_SPEED_LIMIT | LSV_ERROR_HANDLE | LSV_DRYRUN;
01283                 lr->lr_speed = bk->lb_speed_limit;
01284                 lr->lr_version = bk->lb_version;
01285                 lr->lr_param |= bk->lb_param;
01286                 lr->lr_async_windows = bk->lb_async_windows;
01287                 lr->lr_flags = LEF_TO_OST;
01288 
01289                 /* Notify OSTs firstly, then handle other MDTs if needed. */
01290                 ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
01291                 laia->laia_ltds = ltds;
01292                 down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
01293                 cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
01294                         ltd = lfsck_tgt_get(ltds, idx);
01295                         LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
01296 
01297                         laia->laia_ltd = ltd;
01298                         rc = lfsck_async_request(env, ltd->ltd_exp, lr, set,
01299                                         lfsck_async_interpret_common,
01300                                         laia, LFSCK_NOTIFY);
01301                         if (rc != 0) {
01302                                 lfsck_lad_set_bitmap(env, com, idx);
01303                                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant fail to "
01304                                        "notify OST %x for %s start: rc = %d\n",
01305                                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), idx,
01306                                        lad->lad_name, rc);
01307                                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
01308                         }
01309                 }
01310                 up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
01311 
01312                 /* Sync up */
01313                 rc = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
01314                 if (rc < 0) {
01315                         ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
01316                         RETURN(rc);
01317                 }
01318 
01319 next:
01320                 if (!(bk->lb_param & LPF_ALL_TGT))
01321                         break;
01322 
01323                 /* link other MDT targets locallly. */
01324                 ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
01325                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01326                 if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
01327                         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
01328                                 ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, idx);
01329                                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
01330 
01331                                 if (!list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_list))
01332                                         continue;
01333 
01334                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_layout_list,
01335                                               &lad->lad_mdt_list);
01336                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list,
01337                                               &lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list);
01338                         }
01339                 } else {
01340                         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
01341                                 ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, idx);
01342                                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
01343 
01344                                 if (!list_empty(&ltd->ltd_namespace_list))
01345                                         continue;
01346 
01347                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_namespace_list,
01348                                               &lad->lad_mdt_list);
01349                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list,
01350                                               &lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list);
01351                         }
01352                 }
01353                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01354                 break;
01355         case LE_STOP:
01356         case LE_PHASE2_DONE:
01357         case LE_PEER_EXIT: {
01358                 struct list_head *phase_head;
01359 
01360                 /* Handle other MDTs firstly if needed, then notify the OSTs. */
01361                 if (bk->lb_param & LPF_ALL_TGT) {
01362                         phase_head = &lad->lad_mdt_list;
01363                         ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
01364                         if (lr->lr_event == LE_STOP) {
01365                                 /* unlink other MDT targets locallly. */
01366                                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01367                                 if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
01368                                         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next,
01369                                                 phase_head, ltd_layout_list) {
01370                                                 list_del_init(
01371                                                 &ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
01372                                                 list_del_init(
01373                                                 &ltd->ltd_layout_list);
01374                                         }
01375                                 } else {
01376                                         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next,
01377                                                         phase_head,
01378                                                         ltd_namespace_list) {
01379                                                 list_del_init(
01380                                                 &ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list);
01381                                                 list_del_init(
01382                                                 &ltd->ltd_namespace_list);
01383                                         }
01384                                 }
01385                                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01386 
01387                                 if (com->lc_type != LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT)
01388                                         break;
01389 
01390                                 lr->lr_flags |= LEF_TO_OST;
01391                                 phase_head = &lad->lad_ost_list;
01392                                 ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
01393                         } else {
01394                                 lr->lr_flags &= ~LEF_TO_OST;
01395                         }
01396                 } else if (com->lc_type != LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
01397                         break;
01398                 } else {
01399                         lr->lr_flags |= LEF_TO_OST;
01400                         phase_head = &lad->lad_ost_list;
01401                         ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
01402                 }
01403 
01404 again:
01405                 laia->laia_ltds = ltds;
01406                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01407                 while (!list_empty(phase_head)) {
01408                         if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
01409                                 ltd = list_entry(phase_head->next,
01410                                                  struct lfsck_tgt_desc,
01411                                                  ltd_layout_list);
01412                                 if (!list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list))
01413                                         list_del_init(
01414                                                 &ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
01415                                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
01416                         } else {
01417                                 ltd = list_entry(phase_head->next,
01418                                                  struct lfsck_tgt_desc,
01419                                                  ltd_namespace_list);
01420                                 if (!list_empty(&ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list))
01421                                         list_del_init(
01422                                                 &ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list);
01423                                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_namespace_list);
01424                         }
01425                         atomic_inc(&ltd->ltd_ref);
01426                         laia->laia_ltd = ltd;
01427                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01428                         rc = lfsck_async_request(env, ltd->ltd_exp, lr, set,
01429                                         lfsck_async_interpret_common,
01430                                         laia, LFSCK_NOTIFY);
01431                         if (rc != 0) {
01432                                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant fail to "
01433                                        "notify %s %x for %s stop/phase2_done/"
01434                                        "peer_exit: rc = %d\n",
01435                                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
01436                                        (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST) ?
01437                                        "OST" : "MDT", ltd->ltd_index,
01438                                        lad->lad_name, rc);
01439                                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
01440                         }
01441                         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01442                 }
01443                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01444 
01445                 rc = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
01446                 if (rc < 0) {
01447                         ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
01448                         RETURN(rc);
01449                 }
01450 
01451                 if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT &&
01452                     !(lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST)) {
01453                         lr->lr_flags |= LEF_TO_OST;
01454                         phase_head = &lad->lad_ost_list;
01455                         ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
01456                         goto again;
01457                 }
01458                 break;
01459         }
01460         case LE_PHASE1_DONE:
01461                 lad->lad_ops->la_sync_failures(env, com, lr);
01462                 lad->lad_touch_gen++;
01463                 ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
01464                 laia->laia_ltds = ltds;
01465                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01466                 while (!list_empty(&lad->lad_mdt_list)) {
01467                         struct list_head *list;
01468                         __u32            *gen;
01469 
01470                         if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
01471                                 ltd = list_entry(lad->lad_mdt_list.next,
01472                                                  struct lfsck_tgt_desc,
01473                                                  ltd_layout_list);
01474                                 list = &ltd->ltd_layout_list;
01475                                 gen = &ltd->ltd_layout_gen;
01476                         } else {
01477                                 struct lfsck_namespace *ns = com->lc_file_ram;
01478 
01479                                 ltd = list_entry(lad->lad_mdt_list.next,
01480                                                  struct lfsck_tgt_desc,
01481                                                  ltd_namespace_list);
01482                                 list = &ltd->ltd_namespace_list;
01483                                 gen = &ltd->ltd_namespace_gen;
01484                                 lr->lr_flags2 = ns->ln_flags & ~LF_INCOMPLETE;
01485                         }
01486 
01487                         if (*gen == lad->lad_touch_gen)
01488                                 break;
01489 
01490                         *gen = lad->lad_touch_gen;
01491                         list_move_tail(list, &lad->lad_mdt_list);
01492                         if (ltd->ltd_synced_failures)
01493                                 continue;
01494 
01495                         atomic_inc(&ltd->ltd_ref);
01496                         laia->laia_ltd = ltd;
01497                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01498                         rc = lfsck_async_request(env, ltd->ltd_exp, lr, set,
01499                                         lfsck_async_interpret_common,
01500                                         laia, LFSCK_NOTIFY);
01501                         if (rc != 0) {
01502                                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant fail to "
01503                                        "notify MDT %x for %s phase1 done: "
01504                                        "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
01505                                        ltd->ltd_index, lad->lad_name, rc);
01506                                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
01507                         }
01508                         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01509                 }
01510                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
01511                 break;
01512         default:
01513                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant unexpected LFSCK event: "
01514                        "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lr->lr_event);
01515                 rc = -EINVAL;
01516                 break;
01517         }
01518 
01519         rc1 = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
01520         ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
01521 
01522         RETURN(rc != 0 ? rc : rc1);
01523 }
01524 
01543 int lfsck_assistant_engine(void *args)
01544 {
01545         struct lfsck_thread_args          *lta     = args;
01546         struct lu_env                     *env     = &lta->lta_env;
01547         struct lfsck_component            *com     = lta->lta_com;
01548         struct lfsck_instance             *lfsck   = lta->lta_lfsck;
01549         struct lfsck_bookmark             *bk      = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
01550         struct lfsck_position             *pos     = &com->lc_pos_start;
01551         struct lfsck_thread_info          *info    = lfsck_env_info(env);
01552         struct lfsck_request              *lr      = &info->lti_lr;
01553         struct lfsck_assistant_data       *lad     = com->lc_data;
01554         struct ptlrpc_thread              *mthread = &lfsck->li_thread;
01555         struct ptlrpc_thread              *athread = &lad->lad_thread;
01556         struct lfsck_assistant_operations *lao     = lad->lad_ops;
01557         struct lfsck_assistant_req        *lar;
01558         struct l_wait_info                 lwi     = { 0 };
01559         int                                rc      = 0;
01560         int                                rc1     = 0;
01561         int                                rc2;
01562         ENTRY;
01563 
01564         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: %s LFSCK assistant thread start\n",
01565                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lad->lad_name);
01566 
01567         memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
01568         lr->lr_event = LE_START;
01569         if (pos->lp_oit_cookie <= 1)
01570                 lr->lr_param = LPF_RESET;
01571         rc = lfsck_assistant_notify_others(env, com, lr);
01572         if (rc != 0) {
01573                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant fail to notify others "
01574                        "to start %s: rc = %d\n",
01575                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lad->lad_name, rc);
01576                 GOTO(fini, rc);
01577         }
01578 
01579         spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
01580         lad->lad_task = current;
01581         thread_set_flags(athread, SVC_RUNNING);
01582         spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
01583         wake_up_all(&mthread->t_ctl_waitq);
01584 
01585         while (1) {
01586                 while (!list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list)) {
01587                         bool wakeup = false;
01588 
01589                         if (unlikely(lad->lad_exit ||
01590                                      !thread_is_running(mthread)))
01591                                 GOTO(cleanup1, rc = lad->lad_post_result);
01592 
01593                         lar = list_entry(lad->lad_req_list.next,
01594                                          struct lfsck_assistant_req,
01595                                          lar_list);
01596                         /* Only the lfsck_assistant_engine thread itself can
01597                          * remove the "lar" from the head of the list, LFSCK
01598                          * engine thread only inserts other new "lar" at the
01599                          * end of the list. So it is safe to handle current
01600                          * "lar" without the spin_lock. */
01601                         rc = lao->la_handler_p1(env, com, lar);
01602                         spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
01603                         list_del_init(&lar->lar_list);
01604                         lad->lad_prefetched--;
01605                         /* Wake up the main engine thread only when the list
01606                          * is empty or half of the prefetched items have been
01607                          * handled to avoid too frequent thread schedule. */
01608                         if (lad->lad_prefetched <= (bk->lb_async_windows / 2))
01609                                 wakeup = true;
01610                         spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
01611                         if (wakeup)
01612                                 wake_up_all(&mthread->t_ctl_waitq);
01613 
01614                         lao->la_req_fini(env, lar);
01615                         if (rc < 0 && bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
01616                                 GOTO(cleanup1, rc);
01617                 }
01618 
01619                 l_wait_event(athread->t_ctl_waitq,
01620                              !lfsck_assistant_req_empty(lad) ||
01621                              lad->lad_exit ||
01622                              lad->lad_to_post ||
01623                              lad->lad_to_double_scan,
01624                              &lwi);
01625 
01626                 if (unlikely(lad->lad_exit))
01627                         GOTO(cleanup1, rc = lad->lad_post_result);
01628 
01629                 if (!list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list))
01630                         continue;
01631 
01632                 if (lad->lad_to_post) {
01633                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: %s LFSCK assistant thread post\n",
01634                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lad->lad_name);
01635 
01636                         if (unlikely(lad->lad_exit))
01637                                 GOTO(cleanup1, rc = lad->lad_post_result);
01638 
01639                         lad->lad_to_post = 0;
01640                         LASSERT(lad->lad_post_result > 0);
01641 
01642                         /* Wakeup the master engine to go ahead. */
01643                         wake_up_all(&mthread->t_ctl_waitq);
01644 
01645                         memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
01646                         lr->lr_event = LE_PHASE1_DONE;
01647                         lr->lr_status = lad->lad_post_result;
01648                         rc = lfsck_assistant_notify_others(env, com, lr);
01649 
01650                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant notified "
01651                                "others for %s post: rc = %d\n",
01652                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
01653                                lad->lad_name, rc);
01654                 }
01655 
01656                 if (lad->lad_to_double_scan) {
01657                         lad->lad_to_double_scan = 0;
01658                         atomic_inc(&lfsck->li_double_scan_count);
01659                         lad->lad_in_double_scan = 1;
01660                         wake_up_all(&mthread->t_ctl_waitq);
01661 
01662                         com->lc_new_checked = 0;
01663                         com->lc_new_scanned = 0;
01664                         com->lc_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current();
01665                         com->lc_time_next_checkpoint =
01666                                 com->lc_time_last_checkpoint +
01667                                 cfs_time_seconds(LFSCK_CHECKPOINT_INTERVAL);
01668 
01669                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant sync before "
01670                                "the second-stage scaning\n",
01671                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck));
01672 
01673                         /* Flush async updates before handling orphan. */
01674                         rc2 = dt_sync(env, lfsck->li_next);
01675 
01676                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant phase2 "
01677                                "scan start, synced: rc = %d\n",
01678                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc2);
01679 
01680                         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_NO_DOUBLESCAN))
01681                                 GOTO(cleanup2, rc = 0);
01682 
01683                         while (lad->lad_in_double_scan) {
01684                                 rc = lfsck_assistant_query_others(env, com);
01685                                 if (lfsck_phase2_next_ready(lad))
01686                                         goto p2_next;
01687 
01688                                 if (rc < 0)
01689                                         GOTO(cleanup2, rc);
01690 
01691                                 /* Pull LFSCK status on related targets once
01692                                  * per 30 seconds if we are not notified. */
01693                                 lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT_INTERVAL(cfs_time_seconds(30),
01694                                                            cfs_time_seconds(1),
01695                                                            NULL, NULL);
01696                                 rc = l_wait_event(athread->t_ctl_waitq,
01697                                         lfsck_phase2_next_ready(lad) ||
01698                                         lad->lad_exit ||
01699                                         !thread_is_running(mthread),
01700                                         &lwi);
01701 
01702                                 if (unlikely(lad->lad_exit ||
01703                                              !thread_is_running(mthread)))
01704                                         GOTO(cleanup2, rc = 0);
01705 
01706                                 if (rc == -ETIMEDOUT)
01707                                         continue;
01708 
01709                                 if (rc < 0)
01710                                         GOTO(cleanup2, rc);
01711 
01712 p2_next:
01713                                 rc = lao->la_handler_p2(env, com);
01714                                 if (rc != 0)
01715                                         GOTO(cleanup2, rc);
01716 
01717                                 if (unlikely(lad->lad_exit ||
01718                                              !thread_is_running(mthread)))
01719                                         GOTO(cleanup2, rc = 0);
01720                         }
01721                 }
01722         }
01723 
01724 cleanup1:
01725         /* Cleanup the unfinished requests. */
01726         spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
01727         if (rc < 0)
01728                 lad->lad_assistant_status = rc;
01729 
01730         if (lad->lad_exit && lad->lad_post_result <= 0)
01731                 lao->la_fill_pos(env, com, &lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint);
01732 
01733         while (!list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list)) {
01734                 lar = list_entry(lad->lad_req_list.next,
01735                                  struct lfsck_assistant_req,
01736                                  lar_list);
01737                 list_del_init(&lar->lar_list);
01738                 lad->lad_prefetched--;
01739                 spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
01740                 lao->la_req_fini(env, lar);
01741                 spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
01742         }
01743         spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
01744 
01745         LASSERTF(lad->lad_prefetched == 0, "unmatched prefeteched objs %d\n",
01746                  lad->lad_prefetched);
01747 
01748 cleanup2:
01749         memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
01750         if (rc > 0) {
01751                 lr->lr_event = LE_PHASE2_DONE;
01752                 lr->lr_status = rc;
01753         } else if (rc == 0) {
01754                 if (lfsck->li_flags & LPF_ALL_TGT) {
01755                         lr->lr_event = LE_STOP;
01756                         lr->lr_status = LS_STOPPED;
01757                 } else {
01758                         lr->lr_event = LE_PEER_EXIT;
01759                         switch (lfsck->li_status) {
01760                         case LS_PAUSED:
01761                         case LS_CO_PAUSED:
01762                                 lr->lr_status = LS_CO_PAUSED;
01763                                 break;
01764                         case LS_STOPPED:
01765                         case LS_CO_STOPPED:
01766                                 lr->lr_status = LS_CO_STOPPED;
01767                                 break;
01768                         default:
01769                                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant unknown "
01770                                        "status: rc = %d\n",
01771                                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
01772                                        lfsck->li_status);
01773                                 lr->lr_status = LS_CO_FAILED;
01774                                 break;
01775                         }
01776                 }
01777         } else {
01778                 if (lfsck->li_flags & LPF_ALL_TGT) {
01779                         lr->lr_event = LE_STOP;
01780                         lr->lr_status = LS_FAILED;
01781                 } else {
01782                         lr->lr_event = LE_PEER_EXIT;
01783                         lr->lr_status = LS_CO_FAILED;
01784                 }
01785         }
01786 
01787         rc1 = lfsck_assistant_notify_others(env, com, lr);
01788         if (rc1 != 0) {
01789                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant failed to notify "
01790                        "others for %s quit: rc = %d\n",
01791                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lad->lad_name, rc1);
01792                 rc = rc1;
01793         }
01794 
01795         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant sync before exit\n",
01796                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck));
01797 
01798         /* Flush async updates before exit. */
01799         rc2 = dt_sync(env, lfsck->li_next);
01800 
01801         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant synced before exit: rc = %d\n",
01802                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc2);
01803 
01804         /* Under force exit case, some requests may be just freed without
01805          * verification, those objects should be re-handled when next run.
01806          * So not update the on-disk trace file under such case. */
01807         if (lad->lad_in_double_scan) {
01808                 if (!lad->lad_exit)
01809                         rc1 = lao->la_double_scan_result(env, com, rc);
01810 
01811                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: LFSCK assistant phase2 scan "
01812                        "finished: rc = %d\n",
01813                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc1 != 0 ? rc1 : rc);
01814         }
01815 
01816 fini:
01817         if (lad->lad_in_double_scan)
01818                 atomic_dec(&lfsck->li_double_scan_count);
01819 
01820         spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
01821         lad->lad_assistant_status = (rc1 != 0 ? rc1 : rc);
01822         thread_set_flags(athread, SVC_STOPPED);
01823         wake_up_all(&mthread->t_ctl_waitq);
01824         lad->lad_task = NULL;
01825         spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
01826 
01827         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: %s LFSCK assistant thread exit: rc = %d\n",
01828                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lad->lad_name,
01829                lad->lad_assistant_status);
01830 
01831         lfsck_thread_args_fini(lta);
01832 
01833         return rc;
01834 }
